name: spring_bar_{BAR105}105.1.1-2314-g9e0bf7d
body:
Github Action Upload

## What's Changed
* `Spring.SetSunDirection` normalizes vector by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/833
* Add `Spring.{Set,Get}UnitSeismicSignature` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/815
* Unit defs article: mention they're static by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/834
* remove obsolete Intel C Compiler support by @goshhhy in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/826
* Move gflags dependency into a submodule by @goshhhy in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/827
* Fix threadpool log formats by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/832
* add mp3 support by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/782
* OverviewController - dynamic rotation by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/774
* SpringController - zoom out fix by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/807
* Changes for the `/ally` feedback message by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/809
* Add `Spring.(De)selectUnit` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/757
* SpringController - fix inconsistent zooming in on map border by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/765
* CBufferedArchive will only buffer files starting from second access  by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/723
* Add `Spring.GetUnitWorkerTask` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/840
* Spring controller add smooth mesh and static camera height tracking by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/731
* Add `wupget:Unit{Entered,Left}Underwater` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/843
* Fix various damage edge cases by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/841
* Startscript reference: remove `ScriptName` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/819
* Add a way to disable `/info` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/842
* Fix #817, add `Spring.SetUnitShieldRechargeDelay` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/847
* Defs keys design pass. See #801 by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/846
* gcc13 compatibility by @rlcevg in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/812
* Fix #487, add player rules params by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/845
* Spring cam zoom out when cursor points out of map bounds by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/844
* Add `Spring.GetUnitIsBeingBuilt` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/850
* fix music crash on windows not loading vfs data correctly by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/852
* fix overview transition centering into middle instead the cursor by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/853
* disable debug library postfix by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/855
* simplify container util func VectorInsertUniqueSorted by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/879
* feat: add fixedSeed param to GameSetup and use it to initialize RNG by @Bruno-DaSilva in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/875
* glTextureInfo fix & GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE by @Krogoth100 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/881
* simplify Container util part 2 by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/908
* Fix clazy (clang tidy) warnings by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/913
* Bar105 cpp 2a by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/915
* Remove snext, spairs, and sipairs by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/888
* Fix COB SetMaxReloadTime parameter by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/859
* Remove LuaMatrix by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/697
* Add `Script.DelayByFrames` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/858
* Fix creation of integer textures by CreateTexture and other formats by @Krogoth100 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/907
* MapGenerator -> BlankMapGenerator by @Krogoth100 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/876
* Fix #866, add bool support to rules params by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/874
* VBO Clear and code cosmetic by @Krogoth100 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/920
* TextureFormat.h fail fix by @Krogoth100 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/925
* Drop alpha channel when saving texture as opaque by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/929
* Add recursive searching to Lua VFS API by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/926
* Calculate new Dgun projectile dir from weaponMuzzlePos by @KyleAnthonyShepherd in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/900
* set sane default vector for nextWantedDir by @KyleAnthonyShepherd in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/917
* weapondef option to update query pieces faster by @KyleAnthonyShepherd in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/901
* Add mempooltypes tests by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/921
* fix cannon prediction bugs by @KyleAnthonyShepherd in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/891
* Fix Constructors to use unit radius in build range check for new units by @marcushutchings in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/930
* GL::State & Texture bind cosmetic by @Krogoth100 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/927
* Add a CEG operators article by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/938
* fix(site): Fix release links, add non coder and shuffle contributors list by @badosu in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/943
* AllowUnitCreation specifies whether to drop order by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/946
* Modrules: `allowGroundUnitGravity` defaults to false by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/862
* github: update docker-build scripts by @verybadsoldier in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/947
* Add a "why choose Recoil" guide by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/821
* Trajectoryheight HaveFreeLineOfFire fix by @KyleAnthonyShepherd in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/944
* Extended inline color codes for fonts by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/924
* consistently use `TeamHandler` for `AllyTeam` data by @nbusseneau in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/954
* add `Spring.SetAllyTeamStartBox` synced control by @nbusseneau in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/958
* gamesetup: warn instead of fail when missing startpos in map configuration by @nbusseneau in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/961
* sim: remove redundant `KillUnit()` parameter by @nbusseneau in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/963
* gamecommands: add new `/remove` cheat-only command by @nbusseneau in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/962
* fix: cpu affinity on linux now correctly prints success messages for thread affinity by @Bruno-DaSilva in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/914
* Add an option to remove map diffuse texture streaming (on by default) by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/967
* Add facing/heading conversion to Lua API by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/974
* Slightly more elegant variadic template bullshit by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/964
* Fix: Unnecessary std::move and other linting by @badosu in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/796
* Add root piece getters to Lua API by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/973
* QTPFSv2 by @marcushutchings in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/904
* Bar105 cleanup1 by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/979
* Get rid of `{u,bi}nary_function` functor inheritance by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/982
* Use C++17 `std::clamp` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/981
* Workaround for SDL audio bug with some soundcards by @FIr3baL in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/957
* Lua selection API improvements by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/991
* "Pick Recoil" article: why not Spring by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/993
* Add named constants for color codes by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/994
* Allow games to customize shared unit orders by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/996
* Add blending equation constants to Lua GL API by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1004
* Add `Spring.IsPosInMap(x, z)` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1003
* Put cursornormal in springcontent by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1001
* Document the 60% CPU thing. by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1009
* Fix missing #include <bit> that is required from latest msvc version by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1013
* Switch from `inline static` to regular `static` to fix clang issue by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1016
* Drop LuaUtils::{Backup,Restore} by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1015
* Bugger off to better target locations by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/983
* Bar105 qtpfs partial shared searching by @marcushutchings in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/995
* Streamline finding docbook.xsl by @svenstaro in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1031
* Drop all references to Matrix room by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1041
* Fix compatibility for old blank map gen by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1093
* Fix CBitmap.Save() for non-4 channel cases by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1132
* Keep shadows textures always on. by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1147
* Add an article about wupget communication by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1148
* Add tracy zones to previously unmarked areas by @Beherith in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1162
* Fix a rare, but nasty desync caused by a unit selection (or lack thereof) by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1174
* Fix a `Spring.UnitAttach` crash on self-attach by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1228
* docs(LuaVAOImpl): remove extra parameter from DrawArrays doc comment by @salinecitrine in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1285

## New Contributors
* @goshhhy made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/826
* @Bruno-DaSilva made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/875
* @KyleAnthonyShepherd made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/900
* @nbusseneau made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/954
* @svenstaro made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1031
* @salinecitrine made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1285

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/compare/spring_bar_%7BBAR105%7D105.1.1-1775-g441af87...spring_bar_%7BBAR105%7D105.1.1-2314-g9e0bf7d
